t:type.name: AlertLog
t:type.t:description: Represents a single entry in an alert_log table

t:attribute.name: alertType
t:attribute.description: alert type such as Security, Smoke, CO, Water, Care

t:attribute.name: hourOfDay
t:attribute.description: The hour of day the alert occurred

t:attribute.name: alertTime
t:attribute.description: The timestamp when the alert was triggerred

t:attribute.name: placeId
t:attribute.description: The UUID of the place where the alert was triggerred
